1.rationale:
🤔 Should I go UP, DOWN, LEFT, or RIGHT? 🤔  
🔍 UP would crash into my own segment at (6,6) – instant death.  
🔎 LEFT lands on (5,5), right next to the rival’s head; if they move UP we’d meet head‑on and both die – not worth it with only 3 apples.  
🔎 DOWN puts me at (6,4), sharing a y‑level with the opponent; they could slide into (6,4) and we’d both die in a double KO, which would hand the win to them (6 apples vs 3).  
💥 RIGHT moves me to (7,5) – safe, puts an apple at (7,4) right below me, and leaves open moves: UP, DOWN, RIGHT for the next turn.  
🗺️ LONG‑TERM PLAN: Grab the (7,4) apple, then swing up or right to stay out of tight corners and keep the enemy boxed in.  

RIGHT
